plugins.name: ultrawork
plugins.description: Strict verification-first development mode with session isolation, mandatory planning, success criteria, evidence collection, and context management

plugins.name: ultrawork-ts
plugins.description: TypeScript/Node.js cross-platform version of ultrawork - strict verification-first development mode with session isolation

plugins.name: teamwork
plugins.description: Multi-session collaboration plugin with role-based workers, file-per-task storage, and dashboard status
